description: Traces briefly the history of the animated cartoon. Discusses the purpose of caricature giving an animal a man's mind and behaviour pattern. Includes excerpts from "Drama Among the Puppets" (France 1908), an Otto Herman treatment (Germany pre 1914), and many others from France, England and America. Suitable for upper secondary level.
